replies.body: Started in bronze 5. 500 games later I made it to bronze 4. My life.

dude as honest advice don't play ranked then, play more norms learn your champs, increase your mechanics as your play norms and just watch youtube videos of league players where you get to see them do cool stuff or look up videos on the champion you want to main, it helps you learn a lot and get better, it's what i've done, went from bronze 4 or 2 can't remember to gold 5
As honest experience, it really could be luck where he's at. I know it's a bit of a cliché to blame teams, but Bronze V is a place where magic happens. Terrible, terrible magic.
anyone half-decent at the game can 1v9 carry a bronze V game.

I'm Diamond 4 and can honestly say, not all low elo games are carry-able. Often times it is easy to win lane and snowball, but "anyone half-decent at the game can 1v9 carry a bronze V game." is a horrible statement to make.
It's zero luck when you're stuck in a division after 500 games. He just needs to improve lol.
My life 700 games bronze 4

Season 4: Bronze 1 to Bronze 4  ~65 games
Season 5: Bronze 4 to Silver 5  ~400 games 

Big thanks to Braum this month to reach my goal of silver since Season 4, now I'ma have my boarder.
Started bronze 4, 50 games later silver V and slightly less trash at the game

Don't trust this guy. The site leads you to never-ending surveys and a virus. He gets money for every survey you do. Also the replies under him are most likely bots or trolls.
Yeah seriously all the people who post this stuff can go die.
Eh, i'm happy with Silver II. Perhaps next Season i'll strive for Gold but this was my first ever ranked season. If you made it to Gold or higher, I salute you guys ^_^.
Hey my first season i was a solid silver. Next season made it to gold, and this season skipped plat and made diamond. Takes time!

What timezone does it end at mid night for?
Is it 12:00 EST, or 12:00 PST?
that my question too
can i still get reward if i get "Actions that have been performed on your account are in violation of the League of Legends Terms of Use"?

Possibly. It depends on if you're currently banned/muted or have been banned/muted for extended periods of time.
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2015-ranked-season-draws-close


◦ Players with bans or chat/ranked restrictions active when the season ends are ineligible for this year’s rewards 
◦ Players banned for seven days or more in the three months prior to the end of the season (August 10) are ineligible for this year’s rewards. 
◦ Players banned for boosting during the 2015 season remain ineligible for rewards 
◦ Players who experienced fraud-related and erroneous bans will still be eligible

I would love to get Victorious Sivir, but after doing my placements this weekend, I feel a little burnt out. I at least made Silver, so I'm excited about that. :D
Didn't get anywhere beyond Silver but that's because I was largely MIA earlier this year with Infinite Crisis. A shame that game closed. I was ranked Top 50 NA there out of thousands.
